label: maximumLinearDimension
comment: Maximum linear spatial dimensions of this trade product.
The maximum linear spatial dimensions of this supply chain packaging.

rangeIncludes.comment: A measure of spatial extent of an object, such as the length, breadth or height of a shipping container.

domainIncludes.comment: Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
